name: Plank with Shoulder Taps

instructions.description: Start in a plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Engage your core and glutes to stabilize your body.
Lift one hand off the floor and tap the opposite shoulder, then return it to the starting position.
Repeat the shoulder tap with the other hand, alternating sides while maintaining a strong plank position.

variations.description: Perform the plank with shoulder taps from your knees instead of a full plank position.
Add a push-up after each shoulder tap to increase the challenge.

commentsNotes: Ensure your body stays in a straight line throughout the exercise to protect your lower back.
Engage your core muscles to prevent your hips from swaying side to side.
Focus on controlled movements to maximize the effectiveness of the exercise.
Listen to your body and modify the exercise if you experience any discomfort or pain.
